TextBody:
Hello Craig,

Thank you for contacting Netwrix Technical Support. 

To help us streamline the troubleshooting process and resolve your issue more efficiently, please provide the following information:  

What is the impact of the issue on your business? 
Who is affected by this issue? 
What steps to troubleshoot the issue have already been taken? 
What are you trying to do or accomplish? 
Is this a new configuration, data collection or report? 
If no, has anything changed in your environment since the last time it worked? 
When did this issue start?  
What are the steps to reproduce? 
What software is currently installed - run this command from an admin Powershell prompt:
Get-CimInstance -Class Win32_Product |Where-Object {($_.Name -Like "Stealth*" -or $_.Name -like "Netwrix*" -or $_.Name -like "Postg*" -or ` $_.Name -like "Python*")} -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

Please perform the follow steps and upload the resulting Artifacts:

Enable Debug Logging
From the NEA Console > Settings > Application
Set Log Level to Debug
Rerun jobs that are failing to collect logs in full detail. Return Log level to warning afterwards.


Please provide logs from the following locations: 
Enterprise Auditor Console: %SAInstallDir%SADatabaseLogsApplication 
Access Information Center (11.6): C:Program FilesSTEALTHbitsAccess Information Center 
Access Information (11.5): C:inetpubwwwrootStealthAUDIT Compliance 

Export of Job(s) – note jobs may be nested under multiple Groups:
Right click on the Job or Job Group experiencing problems and select Export. This creates .zip file containing all logs and configuration settings of your jobs that we can import and review.


From the Job Status Export the Messages Table, CSV is preferred: 
 
Best wishes,
Ilya Kotov
Technical Support Engineer
1-949-407-5125 x7099
____________________ _________
Cybersecurity That Works for You
 
6160 Warren Parkway, Suite 100, Frisco, TX 75034
www.netwrix.com
ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0NgWW6:ref
Subject: Web interface not working after upgrade from 11.5 to 12.0    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0NgWW6:ref ]

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000NgWW6:ref

Hi,

The desktop application works fine its just the web reporting interface that's down since the upgrade from 11.5 to 12.0

This means the only way we have to access reports is via the app on the server which is not ideal when multiple people need to access the reports at the same time.

I'm not sure how the rest of the questions relate to the issue we are having. However I have completed the questions from your response


Craig Tinkler

ICT Technical Engineer (Blackpool Teaching Hospitals)

One Lancashire and South Cumbria

Phone: 01253 952542 | Internal Ext: 52542 | Email: craig.tinkler@nhs.net

[cid:c90469df-f9be-4447-a600-d0b8d824a9ed]







Did you know, you can log requests and report issues directly into our Blackpool ICT Service Desk system without waiting on the phone? Click HERE<https://bth-ism.saasiteu.com/> to access.



Please note: If you receive this email outside your normal working hours, I respect your working pattern and do not expect you to respond outside of it.

I'll look into this issue more thoroughly meanwhile.

Best wishes,
Ilya Kotov

thanks for the prompt support.

TextBody:
!Contact.FirstName},

I am glad that we were able to get your issue resolved. The following is a summary of the ticket for your records.

Symptom
The Web Service stopped working after the upgrade.

Cause
Local System was used instead of a dedicated user with DB access.

Resolution
After changing to a proper user the problem was resolved.

Following this email, you will receive an automated confirmation that the case is closed, along with the ability to re-open the case if any related errors return. In addition, you will also receive a separate email with a survey where you can let us know how we did. Feel free to leave any feedback via the survey link!

Best wishes,
Ilya Kotov
Technical Support Engineer
1-949-407-5125 x7099
____________________ _________
Cybersecurity That Works for You
 
6160 Warren Parkway, Suite 100, Frisco, TX 75034
www.netwrix.com


--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: TINKLER, Craig [craig.tinkler@nhs.net]
Sent: 4/4/2025 7:08 PM
To: techsupport@netwrix.com
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #440969 - - Web interface not working after upgrade from 11.5 to 12.0 [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0NgWW6:ref ]

ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000NgWW6:ref


Thanks Ilya, This was the fix. Was running as Local System this is what the installer creates the service as so might need to be part of the upgrade guide to check.

 

thanks for the prompt support.


 

Craig Tinkler

ICT Technical Engineer (Blackpool Teaching Hospitals)

One Lancashire and South Cumbria

Phone: 01253 952542 | Internal Ext: 52542 | Email: craig.tinkler@nhs.net



 

 

 

Did you know, you can log requests and report issues directly into our Blackpool ICT Service Desk system without waiting on the phone? Click HERE to access.

 

Please note: If you receive this email outside your normal working hours, I respect your working pattern and do not expect you to respond outside of it.

 


 

 

 


From: Netwrix Support
Sent: Friday, April 04, 2025 3:34 PM
To: TINKLER, Craig (BLACKPOOL TEACHING HOSPITALS NHS FOUNDATION TRUST)
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #440969 - - Web interface not working after upgrade from 11.5 to 12.0 [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0NgWW6:ref ]

 


	
		
			
			 
			
			
			This message originated from outside of NHSmail. Please do not click links or open attachments unless you recognise the sender and know the content is safe.
			
		
	


Craig,

Also make sure that the Web Service runs as a user with access to the Database, not as Local System.

Best wishes,

Ilya Kotov

Technical Support Engineer
1-949-407-5125 x7099

www.netwrix.com



--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: Netwrix Support [techsupport@netwrix.com]
Sent: 4/4/2025 4:30 PM
To: craig.tinkler@nhs.net
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #440969 - - Web interface not working after upgrade from 11.5 to 12.0 [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0NgWW6:ref ]

Craig,

Most likely to be a certificate issue, please check this article: https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Install/Application/Reports/Secure.htm

I'll look into this issue more thoroughly meanwhile.

Best wishes,
Ilya Kotov
Technical Support Engineer

--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: TINKLER, Craig [craig.tinkler@nhs.net]
Sent: 4/4/2025 4:25 PM
To: techsupport@netwrix.com
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #440969 - ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000NgWW6:ref - Web interface not working after upgrade from 11.5 to 12.0 [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0NgWW6:ref ]

ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000NgWW6:ref
 

Hi,

 

The desktop application works fine its just the web reporting interface that's down since the upgrade from 11.5 to 12.0

 

This means the only way we have to access reports is via the app on the server which is not ideal when multiple people need to access the reports at the same time.

 

I'm not sure how the rest of the questions relate to the issue we are having. However I have completed the questions from your response


 

Craig Tinkler

ICT Technical Engineer (Blackpool Teaching Hospitals)

One Lancashire and South Cumbria

Phone: 01253 952542 | Internal Ext: 52542 | Email: craig.tinkler@nhs.net



 

 

 

Did you know, you can log requests and report issues directly into our Blackpool ICT Service Desk system without waiting on the phone? Click HERE to access.

 

Please note: If you receive this email outside your normal working hours, I respect your working pattern and do not expect you to respond outside of it.

 


 

 

 


From: Netwrix Support
Sent: Friday, April 04, 2025 12:52 PM
To: TINKLER, Craig (BLACKPOOL TEACHING HOSPITALS NHS FOUNDATION TRUST)
Subject: Web interface not working after upgrade from 11.5 to 12.0 [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0NgWW6:ref ]

 


	
		
			
			 
			
			
			This message originated from outside of NHSmail. Please do not click links or open attachments unless you recognise the sender and know the content is safe.
			
		
	


Hello Craig,

Thank you for contacting Netwrix Technical Support. 

To help us streamline the troubleshooting process and resolve your issue more efficiently, please provide the following information:  

What is the impact of the issue on your business?  unable to access published reports via the web interface
Who is affected by this issue?  all system users
What steps to troubleshoot the issue have already been taken?  reviewed configuration, rebooted server.
What are you trying to do or accomplish?  upgrade application from 11.5 to 12.0
Is this a new configuration, data collection or report?  no
If no, has anything changed in your environment since the last time it worked?  updated software version
When did this issue start?  today
What are the steps to reproduce?  uninstall 11.5 and install 12.0 as per the upgrade guide
What software is currently installed - run this command from an admin Powershell prompt:

Get-CimInstance -Class Win32_Product |Where-Object {($_.Name -Like "Stealth*" -or $_.Name -like "Netwrix*" -or $_.Name -like "Postg*" -or ` $_.Name -like "Python*")} -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

 

Name             Caption                                                         Vendor                                                          Version                        

----             -------                                                         ------                                                          -------                        

Netwrix Enter... Netwrix Enterprise Auditor V12.0                                Netwrix Corporation                                             12.0.0.1053

StealthINTERC... StealthINTERCEPT Server                                         STEALTHbits Technologies                                        7.3.9.180

Stealthbits A... Stealthbits Activity Monitor                                    Stealthbits Technologies LLC                                    6.0.633

 


Please perform the follow steps and upload the resulting Artifacts:

Enable Debug Logging
From the NEA Console > Settings > Application
Set Log Level to Debug
Rerun jobs that are failing to collect logs in full detail. Return Log level to warning afterwards.


Please provide logs from the following locations: 
Enterprise Auditor Console: %SAInstallDir%SADatabaseLogsApplication 
Access Information Center (11.6): C:Program FilesSTEALTHbitsAccess Information Center 
Access Information (11.5): C:inetpubwwwrootStealthAUDIT Compliance 

Export of Job(s) – note jobs may be nested under multiple Groups:
Right click on the Job or Job Group experiencing problems and select Export. This creates .zip file containing all logs and configuration settings of your jobs that we can import and review.


From the Job Status Export the Messages Table, CSV is preferred: 
 
Best wishes,
Ilya Kotov
Technical Support Engineer
1-949-407-5125 x7099

www.netwrix.com
